model.users

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.users.Student
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class Student is composed of a first name, last name, username, id, email, dateOfBirth, a collection of courses enrolled, a phone number, and a grade level. Students will belong to a student roster in the SpreadsheetCourse class. Each student also contains a collection of grades that are linked to specific assignments. Class Student provides methods to add, edit, or remove grades; add or or remove courses; and edit student info.
    Author:
    Kevin Feutz (kfeutz@calpoly.edu)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addGrade

        public void addGrade(SpreadsheetCourse course,
            Assignment assignment,
            Grade grade)
              throws BadDataException
        Adds the passed grade to the this Student's collection of grades. The Grade "grade" added must not already exist in this Student's grade collection. A valid Assignment "assignment" must also be passed in order to create the appropriate mapping from "assignment" to "grade" pre: Assignment assignment must be a valid assignment for this Student's course. Also, the student must not have a Grade for the same assignment already in the collection post: Grade grade is mapped to Assignment assignment
        Parameters:
        assignment - The Assignment in which the passed grade will be mapped to.
        grade - The Grade that is being added to this Student.
        Throws:
        BadDataException

      • removeGrade

        public void removeGrade(SpreadsheetCourse course,
               Assignment assignment)
        Removes the passed grade from this Student's current collection of grades. The grade removed must exist in this Student's current grades collection. pre: Assignment assignment is a valid Assignment in this Student's grade collection. This student's grade collection must contain a grade that maps to the passed Assignment post: This Student's HashMap no longer contains a mapping from the passed Assignment to its corresponding grade.
        Parameters:
        assignment - The Assignment which maps to the correct grade to be removed

      • editGrade

        public void editGrade(Grade oldGrade,
             Grade newGrade)
        This method is used to edit an existing grade in this Student's grade collection. This method takes in a grade to be editted, along with a grade containing the new value to be assigned. pre: The Grade oldGrade and the Grade newGrade must not be the same. The Grade oldGrade must already be in the current grades collection. post: Grade oldGrade changes to and now equals Grade newGrade
        Parameters:
        oldGrade - The Grade that will be editted by this method
        newGrade - The Grade containing the new value for oldGrade

      • addCourse

        public void addCourse(SpreadsheetCourse course)
        This method adds a SpreadsheetCourse to the collection of the Student's enrolled courses. This student must not be enrolled in the passed SpreadsheetCourse. pre: This Student is not already enrolled in the passed SpreadsheetCourse post: The passed SpreadsheetCourse is now in this Student's collection of SpreadsheetCourses
        Parameters:
        course - The SpreadsheetCourse to add to this Student's collection of SpreadsheetCourses

      • getGraceDays

        public java.lang.Integer getGraceDays(SpreadsheetCourse course)
        This method retrieves a grace day based on the passed course.
        Parameters:
        course - The course which has the amount of grace days
        Returns:
        Integer The amount of grace days for the course

      • setGraceDays

        public void setGraceDays(SpreadsheetCourse course,
                java.lang.Integer days)
        Sets the amount of grace days based on the passed parameters
        Parameters:
        course - The course containing the grace days.
        days - The number of days to grace.

      • removeCourse

        public void removeCourse(SpreadsheetCourse course)
        This method removes a SpreadsheetCourse from the collection of the Student's enrolled courses. This student must be enrolled in the passed SpreadsheetCourse. pre: This Student is already enrolled in the passed SpreadsheetCourse post: The passed SpreadsheetCourse is now not in this Student's collection of SpreadsheetCourses
        Parameters:
        course - The SpreadsheetCourse to remove from this Student's collection of SpreadsheetCourses

      • editStudent

        public void editStudent(java.lang.String first,
               java.lang.String middle,
               java.lang.String last,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String studentId,
               java.lang.String email,
               java.lang.String major,
               java.lang.String gradeLevel,
               java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                 throws StudentDataException
        This method edits a Student's information. This method will call various setter methods in the Student class pre: Student info contains at least one different field in Student and all of the fields are valid post: This Student contains data matching the passed info
        Parameters:
        first - The first name of the student
        middle - The middle name of the student
        last - The last name of the student
        username - The username of the student
        studentId - The ID of the student
        email - The email of the student
        major - The major of the student
        gradeLevel - The grade level of the student
        phoneNumber - The phone number of the student
        Throws:
        StudentDataException

      • getAssignmentGrade

        public Grade getAssignmentGrade(Assignment assign)
        Computes the corresponding grade in this Student's grade collection by finding the value mapped to by the passed Assignment. pre: The passed Assignment is a key in this Student's map collection of assignments and grades post: The correct Grade value is returned
        Parameters:
        assign - The assignment that maps to the desired Grade in this Student's collection of Grades
        Returns:
        Grade The Grade mapped to by the passed Assignment
